title: Cart item
description: An item in a shopping cart.

index.description: The index, starting from zero, representing the order in which the item was added to the shopping cart.

product.description: The details of the product that the item represents.

quantity.description: The number of units of the item in the shopping cart.

total.description: The total for the item. It includes discounts and any other adjustment.

discount.description: The amount of the discount applied to the item.

coupon.description: The coupon applied to the item.
